L

LEFT_ALT - Static variable in class engine.input.Keyboard
 
LEFT_CTRL - Static variable in class engine.input.Keyboard
 
LEFT_SHIFT - Static variable in class engine.input.Keyboard
 
length() - Method in class engine.math.Vector2D
Calculates and returns the distance between (0, 0) and this object's (x, y).
load() - Method in class ecosim.game.EcoSim
 
load() - Method in class engine.Game
Load will call loadKeyFunctions(), loadMouseFunctions and loadImages().
load(String, String) - Static method in class engine.graphics.ImageLibrary
Reads the image path as a BufferedImage and saves it, mapped to the given alias.
loadGame(Game) - Static method in class engine.GameEngine
Calls the given game's load() method then sets main window size to the dimensions returned from game.getWinWidth() and game.getWinHeight() and makes it visible.
loadImages() - Method in class ecosim.game.EcoSim
Loads the standard EcoSim images to the ImageLibrary.
loadImages() - Method in class engine.Game
This method should load the Game's image files and store them in the ImageLibrary class.
loadKeyFunctions() - Method in class ecosim.game.EcoSim
Loads the standard keyboard functions: Press these keys to perform the following functions: Escape = QUIT Space = PAUSE Tilde = DEBUG Left Control = PAUSE/STEP
loadKeyFunctions() - Method in class engine.Game
This method should create the Game's Keyboard Functions and bind them to appropriate Key Constants in the Keyboard class.
loadMouseFunctions() - Method in class ecosim.game.EcoSim
Loads the standard Mouse functions.
loadMouseFunctions() - Method in class engine.Game
This method should create the Game's Mouse Functions and bind them to appropriate buttons in the Mouse class.
